title: Go 1.2RC3 + Mac OS X 10.9 ld: library not found for -lcrt1.10.5.o
body:
by **thesuggestednamesareawful**: 
Note: I realize that OS 10.9 may not yet be supported.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a pro

go get github.com/cznic/ql/ql

cd ql/ql
go build
# github.com/cznic/ql/ql
ld: library not found for -lcrt1.10.5.o
collect2: ld returned 1 exit status
/local/go/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/6l: running gcc failed: unsuccessful exit status 0x100


What is the expected output?
Successful build

What do you see instead?
See above

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
Mac OS X 10.9

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version go1.2rc3 darwin/amd64

(go built from source using the latest Xcode)

Please provide any additional information below.
